name: Bondi Theme
details: My First Bootstrap project, built from a youtube course by Osama Elzero

name: Chessboard
details: a simple chessboard application built with JavaScript and HTML. It allows you to play chess with a friend on the same device by clicking on the squares to move the pieces.

name: Space Tourism
details: This is a solution to the Space tourism website challenge on Frontend Mentor, I built with the help of Kevin Powell tutorial

name: Sneakers
details: This is a solution to the E-commerce product page challenge on Frontend Mentor.

name: Calender
details: This App was built to practice working with Dates, it is a Responsive dynamic Calender with an events lists. I built this following along with a Youtube totorial and then tried to adjust the design a little more

name: Notes
details: a Responsive Sticky Notes App that uses the LocalStorgae to save the notes you create for you

name: Connect Four
details: a web-based connect four game built with JavaScript and HTML. It allows you to play connect four with a friend on the same device. The game logic checks for horizontal, vertical and diagonal matches of four pieces of the same color.

name: Multi-Steps Form
details: This is a solution to the Multi-step form challenge on Frontend Mentor

name: Azkar: A Web App for Daily Islamic Remembrance
details: a web application that helps Muslims perform their daily remembrance of Allah by providing them with a selection of azkar (supplications) and the number of times they should be recited. The application is built with vanilla JavaScript. This project demonstrates how to use JavaScript to create a simple and useful app for a specific audience.

name: Pricing Component
details: This is a solution to the Interactive pricing component challenge on Frontend Mentor.

name: Currency Converter
details: This App was built to practice working with curency API, you choose your currency and the new one, then type in the amount you want to convert

name: Speed Test
details: This a typing speed game that generates Quotes Randomly using Fetch with an online api and test how fast can you type them

name: Kasper Template
details: This is Kasper Template Project built using HTML and CSS and Javascript. I built this after watching Elzero Tutorial for the css and html then added the Javascript part on my own

name: Leon Template
details: This is Leon Template Project built using HTML and CSS and Javascript. I built this after watching Elzero Tutorial for the css and html then added the Javascript part on my own

name: Blogr landing page
details: This is a solution to the Blogr landing page challenge on Frontend Mentor

name: Furnitures
details: a Menu App with Search Filter and Dark mode

name: Gallery
details: a Photo Gallery with categories and modal screen

name: Numbers Stats
details: a section of numbers that start counting when scrolled to

name: Things To-do
details: a web app that lets you create, edit and delete tasks and, saves your data automatically, it also helps you measure how much time you spend on each task. Whenever you finish a task, it will ask you how long it took and record it for you. You can then see at end of the day how much hours did you work.

name: Math Quiz
details: This is a simple math Quizz with a timer

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
details: This is a tic-tac-toe game using minmax algorithm, I built this following youtube videos

name: HangMan
details: This is a HangMan game that I built after watching Elzero tutorial then costomized the design

name: StopWatch
details: a simple Stop Watch with pause and play and reset buttons

name: slider
details: a simble image slider built from Elzero tutorial

name: Random Quote
details: a random quote generator

name: Modal
details: a modal that slides down from top 'first time I learned it:)'

name: Calculator
details: a simple calculator I built through the forntEnd Masters Bootcamp

name: Githup Repos
details: working with the github API, I built this from Elzero Tutorial video

details: This is a solution to the [FAQ accordion card challenge on Frontend Mentor]
